name: Chitin Creek
description:
Sensible folks don't travel Chitin Creek.

Chitin Creek is a brief piece of weird fiction presented in the style of an Atari 2600 game. The story focuses on a lone rider and their horse as they traverse a curious desert ecosystem along a shunned stretch of river.

This game has sound, but the effects are sparse.

Controls: Arrow keys move, Esc key quits, F4 toggles fullscreen.
